title: Mediaeval England
creator_credit: Gateway Film Productions, Clement W. Bending and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Gives a general account of life in medieval England, looking at the life and work of the peasants, the three field system of agriculture, houses of the rich and poor, the church and monastry, the work of the monks and nuns and Holy Day celebrations. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
